metadata.title: CVE-2017-10687 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: In LibSass 3.4.5, there is a heap-based buffer over-read in the functionjson_mkstream() in sass_context.cpp. A crafted input will lead to a remotedenial of service attack.

criterions.comment: libsass: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
